name: FetchProjectFiles
description:
Fetches all files within a given Figma project.

Use this tool to retrieve a complete list of files contained in a specified Figma project. It should be called when you need to gather information about the files present in a project.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Figma project from which to list files.

value_schema.description: ID of the project to list files from

parameters.name: include_branch_metadata
parameters.description: Include branch metadata in the response for each main file with a branch inside the project. Set to True to enable.

value_schema.description: Returns branch metadata in the response for each main file with a branch inside the project.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: branch_data
parameters.description: Returns branch metadata in the response for each main file with a branch inside the project.

value_schema.description: Returns branch metadata in the response for each main file with a branch inside the project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project to list files from

value_schema.description: ID of the project to list files from

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
